This is a part of a file

// !---=startImportHere(simpleImportFile.txt)=---!
This is an import file

* with a list
* of things
// !---=endImportHere(simpleImportFile.txt)=---!

// !---=startImportHere(/subfolder/anotherImportFile.txt)=---!
And this list:

* and this item too
// !---=endImportHere(/subfolder/anotherImportFile.txt)=---!

This is the end of the file
